name: PRWTech
description: PRWTech is a partnership between Etech Global Services and PRWT Services. Etech Global Services is a leading provider of intelligent sales, service and technology solutions specializing in inbound and outbound voice and live chat. PRWT is a world-class high-performance provider of business process solutions, document processing, and facilities management services.  Because of both companies’ performance, they have earned solid reputations as value-added strategic partners.
